projects.title: ChopChop - Lawn Care Booking App
projects.description: ChopChop is a .NET MAUI app that allows users to book lawn care services like grass cutting. Users can upload pictures of the areas that need to be cut, or use maps and AI to receive a price estimate based on the lawn size and other factors. The app aims to reduce the need for door-to-door promotion by allowing easy online bookings. It is hosted on Firebase and available on Google Play.
keyFeatures: Integration with Google Maps for area measurement

projects.title: Movie Challenge App
projects.description: The Movie Challenge app is a .NET MAUI application that allows users to challenge others to watch a movie from an optional genre or a randomly selected one. The AI suggests movies, and as an affiliate, users can watch them through a third-party site. After watching, AI generates a questionnaire with varying difficulty based on how many times the movie was watched. Winners earn points that were bet, and points can also be earned by completing questionnaires. Hosted on Firebase and available on Google Play.
keyFeatures: Dynamic questionnaire generation based on movie viewings
Affiliate integration for third-party movie platforms

projects.title: AI-Powered Project with ML.NET
projects.description: This project showcases the integration of ML.NET into a .NET MAUI application to demonstrate machine learning capabilities. The project includes a recommendation system that suggests products, a predictive model for pricing, and an image classification feature. Hosted on Firebase and available on Google Play, it serves as an example of how ML.NET can be utilized in real-world applications.
keyFeatures: Product recommendation engine using collaborative filtering
Predictive pricing model using regression analysis

projects.title: Community Service Verification App
projects.description: This .NET MAUI app allows users to log and verify their community service work. Users can submit their community service details, and the app verifies the work with associated organizations. The app aims to provide a reliable and easy way for people to track and validate their community service hours, which can be used for various purposes like school credits or job applications. Hosted on Firebase and available on Google Play.
keyFeatures: Integration with local and national community service organizations
